LanguageData.DankPyon_HornetHoney.label: hornet honey
LanguageData.DankPyon_HornetHoney.description: A deathly sweet liquid secreted by the black hornets. Consuming it leads to numbing the sensation of pain but sharpening one's reflexes, improving melee and shooting abilities.
LanguageData.DankPyon_HornetHoneyHigh.label: high on hornet honey
LanguageData.DankPyon_HornetHoneyHigh.description: Hornet honey in the bloodstream. It supercharges combat-related abilities, and instantly increases psyfocus when first consumed.
LanguageData.DankPyon_HornetHoneyHigh.stages.0.label: high on hornet honey
LanguageData.DankPyon_HornetHoneyHigh.stages.0.descri: I feel pumped but steady. I am the bullet in flight, ready to cut through you.
LanguageData.DankPyon_HornetHoney.label: hornet honey
LanguageData.DankPyon_Chemical_HornetHoney.label: hornet honey
LanguageData.DankPyon_Chemical_HornetHoney.descriptio: Because of a hornet honey addiction, this person needs to regularly consume the drug to avoid withdrawal symptoms.
LanguageData.DankPyon_HornetHoneyAddiction.label: hornet honey addiction
LanguageData.DankPyon_HornetHoneyAddiction.descriptio: A chemical addiction to hornet honey. Long-term presence of hornet honey has caused neurological adaptations at the cellular level, so the brain can no longer function properly without the drug. \nWithout regular doses of hornet honey, withdrawal symptoms will begin. However, extended abstinence will force the brain to adapt back to its normal state, resolving the addiction.
I'm all fuzzy and can't think straight. My limbs feel heavy, I'm tired and hungry, everything hurts. And why won't my eyes focus properly?
LanguageData.DankPyon_HornetHoneyTolerance.label: hornet honey tolerance
LanguageData.DankPyon_HornetHoneyTolerance.descriptio: A built-up tolerance to hornet honey. The more severe this tolerance is, the more hornet honey it takes to get the same effect.
LanguageData.DankPyon_UnpleasantAftermath.label: unpleasant aftermath
LanguageData.DankPyon_UnpleasantAftermath.description: An unpleasant delayed after-effect of drug intoxication.
LanguageData.DankPyon_UnpleasantAftermathThought.stag: My head hurts from all that liquor.
It feels like a gaggle of geese are pecking at my skull.
